#text=In need of a new series to sink my teeth into , I decided to head to the public library .
#text=I ca n't seem to go long without reading some mythical , crazy fantasy !
#text=Anyway , when I got to the Library , I sat down at their computer where you can look up where certain books are in the library .
#text=I found where the fantasy section was and headed over to that shelf .
#text=Oh my goodness , there were more books than I could ever imagine !
#text=I saw the series I was looking for and decided to get just the first book in the series -LRB- so I do n't binge read -RRB- .
#text=I took the book up to the front counter and handed the librarian my member card so that I could check the book out .
#text=She looked the book over and commented that it was one of her favorites which made me smile .
#text=With the book now checked out , I slipped it into my page and made my way home .
#text=I was ready to dive into a new adventure !
